title: Stage Lv5-A3-S12
description: Level 5 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Research ethical standards must be strictly observed. (academic variant 1)
Academic integrity ensures research credibility. (academic variant 1)
learning_points: Level 5 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 연구 윤리 기준을 엄격히 준수해야 합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Research ethical standards must be strictly observed. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 학술적 무결성이 연구의 신뢰성을 보장합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Academic integrity ensures research credibility. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 투명한 연구 과정이 윤리적 책임을 나타냅니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Transparent research processes demonstrate ethical responsibility. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 표절과 같은 연구 부정행위를 방지해야 합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Research misconduct such as plagiarism must be prevented. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 연구자는 사회적 책임을 인식해야 합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Researchers must recognize their social responsibility. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 윤리 위원회의 승인을 받은 연구입니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: This research has been approved by the ethics committee. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 데이터 조작이나 위조는 용납될 수 없습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Data manipulation or fabrication cannot be tolerated. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 연구 참여자의 권익을 보호해야 합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: The rights and interests of research participants must be protected. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 학술적 정직성이 연구의 기본 원칙입니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Academic honesty appears to be a fundamental principle of research. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 윤리적 딜레마에 대한 신중한 고려가 필요합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: Careful consideration of ethical dilemmas appears to be necessary. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 연구 윤리 기준을 엄격히 준수해야 합니다. (학술 2)
sentences.en: Research ethical standards must be strictly observed. (academic variant 2)
